body.p: Sheet music examples are handled as a special form of the figure and tagged with <figure>. For unambiguous identification, the <figure> element can be specified by the @type attribute with the value "notatedMusic".

fig.codeblock: Wann drey Breves aneinander gehengt werden/ vnd die erſte jhre Liniam auffwarts kehret/ gilt die letzte 2. ſchlaͤge.

p.i: Source: Friderici, Daniel: Musica Figuralis, Oder Newe Klärliche Richtige/ vnd vorstentliche vnterweisung/ Der SingeKunst. Rostock, 1619. [Facsimile 17]
